title: Pink Pony Club
lyrics:
[intro, single strum]  
(F)I know… you (Gm)wanted me to stay
But I (Dm)can't ignore the crazy visions (Bb)of me in L.A. 
And (F)I heard… that (Gm)there's a special place
Where (Dm)boys and girls can all be queens (Bb)every single day

[build up]
(F) I'm having wicked dreams, (Gm) of leaving Tennessee
(Dm) Oh, Santa Monica, (Bb) is where it's calling me
(F) Won't make my mama proud, (Gm) it's gonna cause a scene
(Dm) She sees her baby girl, (Bb) and oh she's gonna scream

[pre-chorus]
(F)God, what have you (Gm)done
You're a pink pony (Dm)girl
And you dance at the (Bb)club
Oh mama, (F)I'm just having (Gm)fun
On the stage in my (Dm)heels
It's where I be-(Bb)long down at the…

[chorus]
(F)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Bb) gonna keep on dancing down
In (F)West Hollywood, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, Pink (Bb) Pony Club

(F)I'm up… and (Gm)jaws are on the floor                         
(Dm)Lovers in the bathroom, and a (Bb)line outside the door
(F)Black lights… and a (Gm)mirror disco ball                          
(Dm)Every night's another reason (Bb)why I left it all

(F) I thank my wicked dreams, (Gm) a year from Tennessee
(Dm) Oh, Santa Monica, (Bb) you've been too good to me
(F) Won't make my mama proud, (Gm) it's gonna cause a scene
(Dm) She sees her baby girl, (Bb) and oh she's gonna scream

[pre-chorus]
(F)God, what have you (Gm)done
You're a pink pony (Dm)girl
And you dance at the (Bb)club
Oh mama, (F)I'm just having (Gm)fun
On the stage in my (Dm)heels
It's where I be-(Bb)long down at the…

[chorus]
(F)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Bb) gonna keep on dancing down
In (F)West Hollywood, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, Pink (Bb) Pony Club

[interlude] (F) (Gm) (Dm) (Bb)

[single strum]
(F)Don't think I've (Gm)left you all behind
(Dm)Still love you and Tennessee 
You're (Bb)always on my mind
And (F)mama, (Gm)every Saturday
(Dm)I can hear your Southern drawl
A (Bb)thousand miles away, sayin'

[pre-chorus, build up]
(F)God, what have you (Gm)done
You're a pink pony (Dm)girl
And you dance at the (Bb)club
Oh mama, (F)I'm just having (Gm)fun
On the stage in my (Dm)heels
It's where I be-(Bb)long down at the…

[chorus]
(F)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, I'm (Bb) gonna keep on dancing down
In (F)West Hollywood, I'm (Gm) gonna keep on dancing
At the (Dm)Pink Pony Club, Pink (Bb) Pony Club
[outro] 
(F) (Gm) (Dm)Pink Pony Club, Pink (Bb) Pony Club
(F) (Gm) (Dm)Pink Pony Club, Pink (Bb) Pony Club
(F) [end]
